keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map e scrollPageUp
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollPageUp
map l scrollPageDown
map <a-]> nextTab
map <a-[> previousTab
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
searchEngines:
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
wa: http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram|Alpha
wk: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s ArchWiki
ar: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?K=%s AUR
cp: https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?search=%s CppReference
py: https://docs.python.org/3.7/search.html?q=%s Python
hn: https://www.hnsearch.com/search#request/submissions&q=%s&start=0 HackerNews
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
